title: What’s “baked-in” for Democrats in 2022?
description: Pollster Brian Stryker talks about the lessons Democrats from their loss in Virginia, and what the polling data shows about their prospects for 2022.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: Pollster Brian Stryker talks about the lessons Democrats from their loss in Virginia, and what the polling data shows about their prospects for 2022.
